text.section: Before an organization listed in subsection (b) of this section may operate a gaming event, the organization shall obtain a permit from the commissioner.

section.section: Before the commissioner may issue a permit, the commissioner shall review the character of the organization applying for the permit to ascertain that the organization meets the requirements of §§ 13-503 through 13-505 of this subtitle.
The commissioner shall make any application for a permit and the action taken by the commissioner on that application a matter of public record.
The permit shall state that the gaming event shall be managed and operated personally only by members of the organization obtaining the permit.

text.section:
An organization conducting a gaming event in Baltimore City may not allow an individual or group of individuals to:
benefit financially from the gaming event; or
receive any of the proceeds of the gaming event for personal use or benefit.
